title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 179: Featuring Joey Vitale
description:
On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by former NHLer and current color analyst for the St. Louis Blues Joey Vitale. Joey joins to talk all things Stanley Cup Finals, some Sid and Geno stories and the fight that ended his career. The boys also give their Stanley Cup finals predictions and breakdown how they think the series will go.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
